Package org.optim4j.ns.completioncond

Class UnchangedBestFitness

java.lang.Object
org.optim4j.ns.completioncond.UnchangedBestFitness
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompletionCondition
public final class UnchangedBestFitness extends Object implements CompletionCondition
A completion condition based on unchanged best fitness value for predefined number of generations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    UnchangedBestFitness​(int maxNoOfGenerationsWithUnchangedBestFitness)
    Constructs a completion condition based on maximum number of generations with unchanged best fitness allowed.

    • UnchangedBestFitness

      public UnchangedBestFitness​(int maxNoOfGenerationsWithUnchangedBestFitness)
      Constructs a completion condition based on maximum number of generations with unchanged best fitness allowed.
      Parameters:
      maxNoOfGenerationsWithUnchangedBestFitness - maximum number of generations allowed with unchanged best fitness

  • Method Details

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete​(Agent agent)
      Checks if the maximum no of generations is passed since we get the last best fitness. It updates the last best fitness value once an agent is found having better fitness or increases the value of no of generations with unchanged best fitness. Once value of no of generations with unchanged best fitness equals the configured max generation the completion condition is considered to be achieved.
      Specified by:
      isComplete in interface CompletionCondition
      Parameters:
      agent - an Agent
      Returns:
      completion status of the optimization process
